name: Embedded Comments Demo
tagline: A demo site for Debiki Embedded Comments.
body:
### This is a demo of Debiki Embedded Comments Read about Debiki Embedded Comments here: http://www.debiki.com/for/embedded-comments The demo works like so: first there is an example blog post, and below it there is a section with embedded comments powered by Debiki. Feel free to add test comments. ### Example blog post Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.
